p: Human adenocarcinoma A549 and Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK) cells were purchased from the ATCC and cultured in Dulbeccoâ€™s modified Eagle medium (DMEM, Gibco) and minimal essential medium (MEM; Gibco), respectively, supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; VWR), l-glutamine, and penicillin-streptomycin (Gibco).
